settings.description: Patented Split Technology – 60/40 or 50/50 split seat and/or center cargo pass-through.
Heavy Duty, Easy to Clean Material

settings.quote:
Perfectly sized to fit. Love the material;
seems extremely tough
settings.author: Hugh C.

settings.heading: Design and Function Meet Convenience
settings.description: Our unique patented technology lets you fold down seats 60/40, 50/50 split, and center armrest pass-through without removing the cover.

settings.heading: High-Quality Products Built to Last
settings.description: Our cargo liners are designed with padded & quilted fabric that’s easy to take care of and can withstand wear and tear. The colorfast fabrics won’t fade. We also offer a lifetime warranty on every product.

settings.heading: Keeping Pets Safe, Happy and Healthy
settings.description: Our cargo liners feature a non-slip backing and fasten in place with sturdy seat anchors, keeping your dog safe while in motion. Our products are also free of AZO dyes and heavy metals.

settings.heading: SUV Cargo Liner For Fold Down Seats
settings.description: The 4Knines Multi-Function Dog Split SUV Cargo Liner is a must for anyone owning a dog or pet wanting to keep their vehicle nice and tidy.

settings.heading: Sized to Fit Your SUV
settings.cta_label: Watch the Cargo Liner Fit Guide
settings.description:
Small: 42" x 78" (including 20" bumper flap)

Large: 52" x 82" (including 20" bumper flap)

XL: 55" x 106" (including 20" bumper flap)

Please measure to ensure a great fit.

settings.heading: Waterproof & Non-Slip
settings.description: Special solid waterproof layer makes the seat bottom completely waterproofed (seams, stitching, and zippers are not watertight).

settings.heading: Installs in seconds with quick-release clips
settings.description:
Easy to Clean

Hose it down, wipe down with a moist towel, or toss it in the washer to keep it looking fresh and clean.

Lifetime Warranty

No-hassle 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee & Lifetime Warranty (defects in materials or workmanship).
